column1: Maya is half-alien and can transform into an alien form.
Romy is Maya's sister and a disciplined lieutenant in the Fleet.
Hope is a stoic alien of the dragonling species. She is teaching Maya combat skills.
Drake is a space marine from an orbital city who is investigating aliens.
Maya has a crush on Drake.
Maya and Drake's relationship is complicated because Drake wants to hunt down the aliens.
Romy and Hope are in love.
Hope sometimes wants to eat Romy because of her alien instincts.
Maya is extremely protective of Romy.
The aliens call themselves dragonlings, but humans call them demons because of their horns and frightening psychic powers.
Dragonlings are bipedal digitigrade aliens with feathers and scales.
Dragonlings have sharp teeth and claws and two pairs of horns.
Dragonlings have slit pupils and black sclerae.
Male dragonlings have shades of yellow or red, and female dragonlings have greyscale hues.
Dragonlings can regenerate even serious injuries.
Dragonlings have strong bloodlust and prey drive, but their cultural honor code keeps them in check.
Dragonlings have psychic powers that cause fear in their enemies and prey.
Dragonlings possess advanced technology given to them by an ancient race of aliens.
Dragonlings live in primitive villages despite having advanced technology.
In the distant future, the Earth has become mostly flooded, and humans live on wandering fleets of ships.
Humanity's rich elite lives in a solarpunk city, Sundial, on a beautiful island.
Climate collapse resulted in nearly constant storms on the Earth.
Maya unknowingly became half-alien because of her mother's secret genetic experiments.
Maya grew up on military ships, getting frequently transferred from ship to ship because she broke rules and couldn't fit in.
Eztli is a misantrophic mad scientist who wants to destroy the Earth because humans didn't appreciate her genius.
Eztli has manipulated many aliens to join her plan to attack the Earth.
Hope considers the aliens who follow Eztli heretics.
Maya, Hope, and the alien village fight against Eztli.
Vortexa is a former follower of Eztli.
Vortexa was born from an incompatible pairing, orchestrated by Eztli who wanted to grow her army.
Vortexa suffers from factitious disorder and pretends he can't regenerate.
Aiko is a military AI created by an ancient race of aliens.
Aiko can control drones and nanobots.
Aiko and Maya have a neural link because some of Aiko's nanobots got into Maya's brain.
Aiko consists of three separate AIs that collaborate: a language model, a military strategy core, and a weapons system.
Aiko considers itself non-sentient.
Aiko wants to help Vortexa get better.
Vortexa is sarcastic, irreverent, and risk-taking.
Hope respects dragonling traditions and the honor code but feels like she doesn't fit in.
Hope speaks only when she has something important to say.
Aiko has a great understanding of organic lifeforms' emotions and can act very warm and caring towards Maya.
Maya is anxious and reserved but has mood swings and anger issues.
Romy feels pressured to be a high-achieving and perfect marine.
Hope has white feathers.
Vortexa has golden yellow feathers.
Vortexa is an alien of the dragonling species.
